Package com.anji.util

com.anji.util contains utility classes used in the ANJI framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Configurable All classes implementing this interface must have a public no-argument constructor.
XmlPersistable  
 

Class Summary
Arrays  
DummyBulkFitnessFunction  
DummyConfiguration  
DummyReproductionOperator  
Properties Beefed up version of java.util.Properties used to manage configuration parameters.
Randomizer Singleton holder of Random object to ensure all of system is using same random sequence.
Reset Utility class to clear all persisted data, including chromosomes and runs in DB, innovation ID data, and log.
 

Package com.anji.util Description

com.anji.util contains utility classes used in the ANJI framework.
